content:
During the merge of a PR #6447, an error in alignment (4 tabs in alignment of multilines definitions) has been detected by bors but had been overlooked by all preceding call to lint.
Couldn't the preliminary invocations of lint take care of everything that will eventually be requested?
Isn't it a linter that wasn't yet existing on your branch but which exists on master?
Antoine Chambert-Loir has marked this topic as resolved.
